snippet: Also, Facebook begins to deal with shareholder lawsuits in wake of its initial public offering, and AOL shareholders reject an attempt to unseat three directors.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Painful Online Updates, and Ending a What-I-Ate-at-School Blog
